name: @j0kz/security-scanner-mcp
description: Security Scanner MCP - Detect vulnerabilities, hardcoded secrets, SQL injection, XSS, and OWASP Top 10 issues. Works with Claude Code, Cursor, Windsurf, Roo Code, and any MCP-compatible editor.

scripts.build: tsc && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const src='src/patterns'; const dest='dist/patterns'; fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true}); fs.readdirSync(src).filter(f=>f.endsWith('.json')).forEach(f=>fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src,f),path.join(dest,f)))"

author: j0kz (https://www.npmjs.com/~j0kz)
